short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lossless utility for converting webp and other image formats into either PNG or JPG file types.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lossless Image Converter - Convert WebP to PNG or JPEG

Transform your WebP images into high-quality PNG or JPEG files effortlessly with the Lossless Image Converter. This powerful Chrome extension ensures that your images retain their original quality, offering lossless conversion for all your image needs.

Key Features:

Lossless Conversion: Maintain the original quality of your WebP images when converting to PNG or JPEG formats.
Easy to Use: Simple and intuitive interface allows you to convert images with just a few clicks.
Fast Processing: Efficiently convert multiple images in seconds, saving you valuable time.
Batch Conversion: Upload multiple WebP images and convert them to PNG or JPEG formats simultaneously.
Secure: Your images are processed securely, ensuring your data privacy.
Whether you're a professional designer or a casual user, the Lossless Image Converter is the perfect tool to handle all your image conversion needs without compromising on quality.

How to Use:

Click the "Select Image" button to upload your WebP files.
Choose the desired output format: PNG or JPEG.
Click the download button to save your converted images.
Download the Lossless Image Converter today and experience hassle-free, high-quality image conversion directly from your browser!
